thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 43 of 61
thread.title: Cory Porter

author: Cory Porter
title: Cory Porter
text: As a Canadian who suffers the consequences(duties, import tax, shipping costs, etc.) of importing my purchases, I always check with Ssense first. Their selection is vast, prices are usually on par or better than international sites, and shipping/returns are free. Honestly, we're lucky to have a higher-calibre retailer such as Ssense in Canada to protect us from the hassles of international shopping.
